column2: Have you read the CNCF Platform White Paper?
column3: Have you read the CNCF Platform Engineering Maturity Model?
column4: How many years have you been working on platforms?
column5: Are you part of a designated platform team?
column6: What is the name of your team within the org?
column7: How many people are part of your team?
column8: What is the purpose of your platform?
column9: How many years has the platform you work on existed?
column10: What other roles are on the team?
column12: What capabilities does your platform provide?
column13: How do your users access those capabilities?
column14: Do you communicate the release of new capabilities and platform changes to users? If yes, through which Channels?
column15: Do you provide support for using the platform? If yes, through which channels?
column17: How often does your team have planning meetings to set priorities?
column18: Who's involved in the planning meetings?
column19: How often do you revisit your priorities?
column20: In the past 6 months, which describes your roadmap updates?
column21: Is your roadmap available to other teams?
column22: Do you use a prioritization framework?
column23: Which, if any, of the following activities has your team conducted in the past year?
column24: Which, if any, of the insights from the following activities directly shaped the roadmap?
column25: Does your team have any of the following documented for your users?
column26: Do you collect feedback from platform users?
column27: How often do you collect feedback?
column28: What form does the feedback take?
column29: Is the feedback used to inform decisions?
column30: What is the goal of your platform?
column31: How do you measure the impact of your platform?
column32: Do these metrics feed back into your platform roadmap?
column33: If metrics inform the roadmap, how?
column34: Do you have executive sponsors? (Meaning support from ie. C-Suite)
column35: How does your team get funded?
column36: How do executives view the platform?
